text: Eze Kingsley Obumneme is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a central defender for Mohammedan SC. ==Career== ===India=== Kingsley Obumneme has spent the majority of his career playing in the I-leagues in India. He has played for clubs such as United,in I-league 2nd division and Peerless in the Calcutta Football League. ===Aizawl=== On 24 December 2016, Obumneme signed with professional I-League side Aizawl. He made his debut for the club on 7 January 2017 against East Bengal. He started the match and played the full ninety minutes as Aizawl drew 1–1. ===Mohun Bagan A.C=== In 2017, he signed A One year contract with Mohun Bagan in the I-league 2017-18 Season. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Domestic Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Aizawl |2016–17 |I-League||17||0||—||—||0||0||—||—||17||0 |- |rowspan="1"|Mohun Bagan A.C. |2017–18 |I-League||18||2||—||—||0||0||—||—||18||2 |- |Mohammedan SC |2019–20 |I-League 2nd Division||4||0||—||—||0||0||—||—||4||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !39!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!39!!2 |} ==Honours and Titles== ===Club=== ;Aizawl FC *I-League(1): 2016-17 ;Mohun Bagan *Calcutta Football League (1): 2018–19 ;Mohammedan SC *I-League 2nd Division(1): 2019–20 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Aizawl F.C. players Category:Association football defenders Category:Calcutta Football League players Category:Mizoram Premier League players Category:I-League players Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in India Category:1996 births
